Package metrics

Class Method

java.lang.Object
metrics.Method
public class Method
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an instance of a Method in a java file

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Method()
    Creates a Method without parameters the specified name
    Method​(java.lang.String method_name)
    Creates a Method with a specified name
